title: I try to start a game, screen goes off.
body: So today I installed the game after a long break with it. So everything runs just fine, the launcher and stuff. So I started a game and the screen simply turns off. Everytime I start a game. Please help

replies.body:
Do you mean you see an *Out of Range* type message after you leave champ select and the game start loading up? If this is the case, try hitting **ALT+ENTER** once you see the black screen. This should toggle you into a different window mode and may resolve this issue if you're experiencing a problem with Full Screen mode.

Let me know if this worked.
Thank you so much! For me it worked. I am trying for two days to repair it..reinstall it.. but nothing worked untill i found this. Thank you!
